description: The adversary intentionally inquires an AI system about it's embedded knowledge. Since some AI systems fully share these resources to explain the source of a certain answer, full knowledge sources or artifacts can sometimes be listed or leaked if targeted directly by an adversary.
name: List Your Docs

object_references.description: An adversary can discover information that's been embedded to the the AI system, with the misconception that it would only be used for training and wouldn't be directly accesible.
